glsa.title: xinetd: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in xinetd could lead to privilege escalation.

background.p: xinetd is a secure replacement for inetd.

description.p: Xinetd does not enforce the user and group configuration directives for TCPMUX services, which causes these services to be run as root.

impact.p: Attackers could escalate privileges outside of the running process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All xinetd users should upgrade to the latest version:
